Headline: #115 Pullman/115th Temporary Reroute at 115th/Wentworth
ShortDescription: 115 Pullman/115th buses are temporarily rerouted via 115th, Halsted, 111th, State, and 115th due to, street blockage near 115th/Wentworth.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#115 Pullman/115th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 115th, Halsted, 111th, State, and 115th due to, street blockage near 115th/Wentworth.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #22 Clark Temporary Reroute at Clark/Racine
ShortDescription: 22 Clark buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Clark, Racine, Belmont, and Clark, due to street blockage near Clark/Addison.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#22 Clark buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Clark, Racine, Belmont, and Clark, due to street blockage near Clark/Addison.

Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Service Delayed at Forest Park
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Forest Park due to police activity. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Forest Park due to police activity.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
